name: DelRow
description:
This is a virtual community that supports a world war simulation, you can create a profile with avatar, rol, behaviour, description; you can see other profiles too, in same way you see world zones statistics and war statistics.

The software is for PC but if it reach many players, I create an App; the PC version is that runs the simulation, it can be with azar values or official values.

Now the software is under test, so replly your opinion or bugs finding.
